resources.string:
Enable "Android Protect"\,to keep "Android Protect" Protect your mobile running smoothly and safely\. 

 "Android Protect" can help you auto check the security of all app\,you don't have to check the phone all the time\. 

 When enabling this feature,you may receive system risk warnings,please tap "OK" to turn the accessibility switch "ON"\. 

 The above methioned functions support Android 4.1+\,no root permission needed\.
 We promise never ever collecting any of your personal information in this accessibility service\. Please feel free to contact us with any problems\.
